thread.title: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp confirms Jordan Henderson set to miss Arsenal visit | Metro News
thread.title_full: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp confirms Jordan Henderson set to miss Arsenal visit | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp confirms Jordan Henderson set to miss Arsenal visit | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 11:20 pm Jordan Henderson hurt himself in training over the weekend (Picture: Getty) 
Jurgen Klopp says he is preparing to do without Jordan Henderson for the visit of Arsenal to Anfield on Saturday. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
Liverpool go into the game on the back of a terrible display against Leicester City and were without their captain Henderson for their latest loss. 
Henderson was a miss in a side that failed to wise up to Leicester’s tried and tested gameplan and the midfielder is losing the battle to be fit for Arsenal’s visit. 
‘It looks like he will not be ready for Arsenal,’ said Klopp after the Leicester game. Liverpool fixtures 
Arsenal (H) – Sat 4 Mar Burnley (H) – Sun 12 Mar Man City (A) – Sun 19 Mar Everton (H) – Sat 1 Apr Bournemouth (H) – Wed 5 Apr Stoke City (A) – Sat 8 Apr Jurgen Klopp has a huge task to lift his players for the Arsenal clash (Picture: Getty) 
‘That’s how it looks but I’m not sure, we will see.’ 
Henderson suffered an injury in training over the weekend, but scans allayed fears he had broken a bone in his foot. 
Liverpool have won just once in the league in 2017 with the defeat to Leicester the latest reminder of the Reds’ inconsistency after so easily brushing Tottenham aside two weeks ago.
